name: Bookmark_rdf_sync_cljs
description: an application to sync your bookmarks with your knowledge base
content_security_policy: default-src 'self';script-src 'self' http://localhost:9000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src ws://localhost:* http://localhost:9000 https://dog.ceo/api/breeds/image/random; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' http://localhost:9000 https://images.dog.ceo  'unsafe-eval' data:;
